statements: SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM user_authentication ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_authentication WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_authentication WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT session_id, user_id, login_timestamp FROM user_sessions WHERE logout_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM user_sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING session_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND created_at <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users LEFT JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id WHERE logout_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM user_sessions WHERE logout_timestamp IS NOT NULL ORDER BY login_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM user_sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(session_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT session_id, created_at FROM sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM login_attempts WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, login_timestamp FROM login_attempts WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT session_id, user_id, session_token FROM sessions WHERE session_id = 'e9150e73-8b3a-4c71-b64f-43ead2493b51';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com' AND username NOT LIKE 'test%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, email, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 3 AND last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT p.reset_code, u.username, pr.created_at FROM password_resets pr JOIN users u ON pr.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY pr.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, phone_number FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password_hash = BYTEA '\x0123456789abcdef';
